title: Last for Van Aert and Fast for Kuss as Puncture Deflates Chances at Clásica Jaén
content:
Belgian superstar finishes last for first time in his career, and Vuelta a España champion helps save the day for Visma-Lease a Bike: 'I did everything I could to help Jan.'

Read the full article at Last for Van Aert and Fast for Kuss as Puncture Deflates Chances at Clásica Jaén on Velo.
author: ahood
